Experience

Dinaka Camp is located on an exclusive conservancy in the northern edge of the Kalahari Game Reserve & home to one of the most unique bio-diversities in Southern Africa.
Home to the Kalahari lion, springbok, oryx & brown hyena, this ever-changing desert landscape never fails to impress.
During the annual summer rains, the arid desert landscape is transformed into a lush green belt of vegetation, offering guests insight into the lesser-known desert experience.

Stay

The camp boasts 7 spacious double thatched safari tents, each with an en-suite bathroom, walk-in shower & outdoor shower with a view. Dinaka’s 2-bedroom thatched tent with a shared en-suite bathroom is ideal for families with young children.
All tents are well spaced & raised on wooden decks, providing the perfect vantage point over a permanent waterhole.
The main area includes a dining room, bar sitting area, campfire with waterhole views & star deck for outside dining.
The Sleep-Out Deck allows guests to spend the night under the magnificent African night sky – a truly magical experience!

Activities

The focus at Dinaka Camp is on morning & evening game drives in open safari vehicles, with night drives heading out into the darkness with a spotlight looking for nocturnal animals.
Educational walks with Bushmen are also offered, allowing guests to have insight into this ancient culture, their survival techniques & historic way of life.

subfolders.title: Deception Valley Lodge
subfolders.description: Deception Valley Lodge enjoys a remote & isolated desert location on the northern-eastern boundary of the Central Kalahari Game Reserve on one of the largest privately-owned game conservancies in Botswana.   On this staggering 43,000 hectares of pristine bushveld, guests will have the rare opportunity to meet the local San Bushmen of the Naru-speaking tribe, & explore this remarkable environment on foot, while their Bushman guide teaches them about their hunting & survival skills.  Learning about the culture of the San people, who over centuries have adapted their lives to survive in the most inhospitable environment, is a unique experience Deception Valley Lodge has to offer.

subfolders.title: Kalahari Plains Camp
subfolders.description: Kalahari Plains Camp is situated in a remote part of the Central Kalahari Game Reserve & offers some of the best summer wildlife opportunities on the continent. This 5million hectares reserve is the largest conservation area in the country & one of the largest in the world.  The Central Kalahari Game Reserve is home to the legendary Kalahari black-maned lion & some of the world’s best cheetah viewing.

subfolders.title: Tau Pan Camp
subfolders.description: The vast & unspoiled Central Kalahari Game Reserve is the largest sand basin in the world & home to the beautiful Tau Pan Camp.   The camp has a unique location overlooking a salt pan & the endless Kalahari horizon, giving it a unique sense of space that is different to any other area in Botswana.
